description:
Classical FREE 3D table foosball packed into a shoebox. Play with a friend in multiplayer mode or against the phone in single player mode.

Show off the 3D capabilities of your phone by rotating the game any direction you want (hold down on the gesture area and rotate the shoebox).

Controls:
[R] - resets the view
[W] - toggles wireframe representation
[F] - toggles FPS
[H] - rotate left
[L] - rotate right
[J] - rotate down
[K] - rotate up
[A] - zoom in
[Z] - zoom out

meta tap + pinch to zoom
meta tap + single finger rotate

www.shoeboxlabs.com

Brought to you by sleepless nights of Jozef Doboš, Charence Wong, Frédéric Besse.
versionNote: Now works on webOS 2.x and higher! Improvements to user control are being worked on. Feedback on this welcome. Please find us on twitter @shoeboxlabs
